context: Hey! I just watched Clerks (1994) and Chasing Amy (1997) so I'm in a comedy mood
Oh nice I loved those movies. Let me see... Have you seen Mallrats (1995)?
I have and loved it actually just visited that mall! Dogma might be my favorite
Well I might just make it a Kevin Smith trilogy tonight. Thank you!
resp: Well there's always Clerks II (2006)! :) No problem! Enjoy!
